name: blue-orb
effect: Causes kyogre to appear in the embedded tower.
short_effect: Summons Kyogre to the Embedded Tower.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A blue, glowing orb
said to contain an
ancient power.

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:

It is said to contain an incredible
power from ancient times.
